auth.loginSubtitle: Andika umwirondoro wawe kugira ngo winjire

hero.title: Ikigo Gicunga iMove
hero.subtitle: Kurikirana ingendo, cunga abakoresha, umenye uko amafaranga yishyurwa, kandi ugenzure ibikorwa byose. Byakorewe koroshya akazi.

features.title: Ubushobozi bw'Ibanze
features.subtitle: Ibikoresho byuzuye byagenewe gucunga buri kintu cyose kijyanye n'ingendo.
features.liveMapDesc: Kureba aho abagenzi n'abamotari baherereye ku ikarita ako kanya.
features.usersDesc: Genzura konti z'abamotari n'abagenzi,emeza imyirondoro, kandi uhindure imiterere yabo.
features.paymentsDesc: Reba ihererekanya rya MTN MoMo & Airtel Money hamwe n'ibikoresho byo kubihuza.
features.analyticsDesc: Sesengura amateka y'ingendo, kwinjiza amafaranga, no kubona raporo zikora.
features.configDesc: Hindura ibiciro, uturere, n'ahari serivisi igihe icyo aricyo cyose.
features.auditDesc: Kurikirana ibikorwa bya sisitemu n'ibintu byabaye mu mucyo.

security.title: Umutekano & Ubunyangamugayo
security.rbacDesc: Uburenganzira bwihariye kuri buri rwego rw'imiyoborere.
security.encryptionDesc: Uburinzi bwa JWT bugezweho kubari gukoresha sisitemu bose.
security.pipelinesDesc: Itumanaho ririnzwe hagati ya porogaramu ya telefoni, urubuga, na base y'amakuru.
security.auditDesc: Buri gikorwa kirandikwa kandi gishobora gushakishwa kugirango haboneke uburyozwe.
security.zeroTrustDesc: Ibikorwa byose bisaba kwemeza umwirondoro n'uburenganzira mbere yo gukora.

cta.title: Injira muri iMove Admin Portal
cta.subtitle: Injira mu bidukikije bizewe kugirango ucunge ibikorwa kandi wizere serivisi nziza.
